content: Hoarfrost can be found in The New West, from the New Thunderclap Temple - Temple Entrance Shrine. From the Shrine, turn and head inside the temple through the opening in the large red wall. Follow the path up, and then to the left until you see some open doors. On this overlook through the doors, you can find the Monk from the Sea boss, whom you will need to defeat to earn the Transformation.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hoarfrost.md', within the main section titled 'Hoarfrost', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Hoarfrost Location'.
The content is as follows:
Hoarfrost can be found in The New West, from the New Thunderclap Temple - Temple Entrance Shrine. From the Shrine, turn and head inside the temple through the opening in the large red wall. Follow the path up, and then to the left until you see some open doors. On this overlook through the doors, you can find the Monk from the Sea boss, whom you will need to defeat to earn the Transformation.
